mapper.select: SELECT textbook_isbn textbookIsbn, textbook_title textbookTitle, textbook_writer textbookWriter, textbook_publisher textbookPublisher FROM textbook ORDER BY textbook_isbn LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO textbook ( textbook_isbn, textbook_title, textbook_writer, textbook_publisher, textbook_info, textbook_price, textbook_publishdate ) VALUES ( #{textbookIsbn}, #{textbookTitle}, #{textbookWriter}, #{textbookPublisher}, #{textbookInfo}, #{textbookPrice}, CURDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT textbook_isbn textbookIsbn, textbook_title textbookTitle, textbook_writer textbookWriter, textbook_publisher textbookPublisher, textbook_publishdate textbookPublishdate, textbook_info textbookInfo, textbook_price textbookPrice FROM textbook WHERE textbook_isbn = #{textbookIsbn}
mapper.update: UPDATE textbook SET textbook_title = #{textbookTitle}, textbook_writer = #{textbookWriter}, textbook_publisher = #{textbookPublisher}, textbook_info = #{textbookInfo}, textbook_price = #{textbookPrice} WHERE textbook_isbn = #{textbookIsbn}
